00044 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00045 |   AP4_CttsTableEntry
00046 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 class AP4_CttsTableEntry {
00048  public:
00049     AP4_CttsTableEntry() : 
00050         m_SampleCount(0), 
00051         m_SampleOffset(0) {}
00052     AP4_CttsTableEntry(AP4_Cardinal sample_count,
00053                        AP4_UI32     sample_offset) :
00054         m_SampleCount(sample_count),
00055         m_SampleOffset(sample_offset) {}
00056 
00057     AP4_Cardinal m_SampleCount;
00058     AP4_UI32     m_SampleOffset;
00059 };
